title: Convert string to pathcase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to pathcase

Pathcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with forward slashes.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello/world"

404: Not Found

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to pathcase

Pathcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with forward slashes.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello/world"
```
